definition: building/shop/term for certain service establishments/embassy or consulate/schoolroom (old)/CL:家[jia1]

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Guo2 jia1 Bo2 wu4 guan3
Zhong1 guo2 Li4 shi3 Bo2 wu4 guan3

sentences.english: Friends of the museum were permitted to buy pieces that were de-accessioned.
sentences.chinese: 館友們也被容許購買博物館出售的館藏。

sentences.english: He was surprised when he stole an exhibit from the museum.
sentences.chinese: 當他從博物館偷盜一件展品時被當場捉住。

sentences.english: It was a similar story for the Toledo Museum of Art.
sentences.chinese: 對於託雷多藝術博物館來說，也是差不多的情況。

sentences.english: The painter bequeathed his collection of art treasures to a museum.
sentences.chinese: 這位畫家把他收藏的美術珍品遺贈給一個博物館。

sentences.english: The Jim Pattison Group also owns the Ripley's Believe It or Not museums.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆帕蒂森集團還擁有裏普利的信不信由你博物館。

sentences.english: Some of Guling's older villas have now been redesignated as museums or shrines.
sentences.chinese: 牯嶺的一些老別墅如今被重新設計成博物館或神殿。

sentences.english: A popular science web about fossils and nature history, and museums.
sentences.chinese: 有關化石和自然歷史的科普及博物館網站。

sentences.english: These students will go on a field trip to a museum.
sentences.chinese: 這些學生將到一家博物館進行校外活動。

sentences.english: And by the way, the most crowdy place in the whole museum is the gift shop.
sentences.chinese: 整座大英博物館裏，就屬禮品店裏的人最多。

sentences.english: Her works have been exhibited locally and in the Ripley's Museum in New York City.
sentences.chinese: 她的作品，在當地的博物館裏普利先生在紐約市。

sentences.english: It is the museum of Hallstatt, but we did not go inside.
sentences.chinese: 這是哈爾斯塔特博物館，不過我們沒有進去參觀。

sentences.english: The Lower East Side Tenement Museum is one of the smaller museums in New York.
sentences.chinese: 下東區房屋博物館是紐約較小的一個博物館。

sentences.english: The Lower East Side Tenement Museum is one of the smaller museums in New York.
sentences.chinese: 下東區房屋博物館是紐約較小的一個博物館。

sentences.english: The promenade ends with the stairs leading up to the museum's observation tower.
sentences.chinese: 長廊終止於直通博物館瞭望塔的樓梯。

sentences.english: There is also a National museum in Chiangmai .
sentences.chinese: 還有一個國家博物館清邁。

sentences.english: A listing of all the museums and institutions represented on the HAR web site.
sentences.chinese: 列出所有的博物館和機構派代表參加的Har網站。

definition: building/shop/term for certain service establishments/embassy or consulate/schoolroom (old)/CL:家[jia1]
to collect in a museum or library/museum collection/library holdings
the Forbidden City/abbr. for 故宮博物院|故宫博物院[Gu4 gong1 Bo2 wu4 yuan4]
